bonding_assets.description: [String] denoms of the assets that can be bonded.

distribution_denom.description: Denom to be swapped to and rewarded

grace_period.description: Grace period the maximum age of a epoch bucket before it's considered expired and fees are forwarded from it

growth_rate.description: Weight grow rate. Needs to be between 0 and 1.

unbonding_period.description: Unbonding period in epochs. The time (in epochs) that needs to pass before an unbonded position can be withdrawn

Decimal.description:
A fixed-point decimal value with 18 fractional digits, i.e. Decimal(1_000_000_000_000_000_000) == 1.0

The greatest possible value that can be represented is 340282366920938463463.374607431768211455 (which is (2^128 - 1) / 10^18)
